main event: On December 2, 1960, an unidentified object was observed in the sky for approximately 31-60 minutes, displaying various bright and colorful characteristics.
interesting points: The object appeared star-like, changed positions from horizontal to vertical multiple times, and then returned to horizontal again., The object was reported to be brighter than the brightest stars., It was observed to stand still, speed up suddenly, break up into parts, and give off smoke., Witness described the sky as bright during the sighting., The observer was a 66-year-old male.
sighted object: bright, colorful unidentified object in the sky
